description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，中国共产党第十九届中央委员会委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army (PLA) of China, and a member of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省下辖的地级市，是盛斌的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Sheng Bin.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一种军衔等级。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任沈阳军区副司令员，后由盛斌接任。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army, former Deputy Commander of the Shenyang Military Region, succeeded by Sheng Bin.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，接替盛斌担任中央军委国防动员部部长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who succeeded Sheng Bin as the Minister of the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任黑龙江省军区司令员，后由盛斌接任。
description.en: A major general of the People's Liberation Army, former Commander of the Heilongjiang Military District, succeeded by Sheng Bin.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，接替盛斌担任黑龙江省军区司令员。
description.en: A major general of the People's Liberation Army who succeeded Sheng Bin as the Commander of the Heilongjiang Military District.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任国家国防动员委员会秘书长，后由盛斌接任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, former Secretary-General of the National Defense Mobilization Committee, succeeded by Sheng Bin.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十八集团军

description.zh-cn: 2003年第23集团军番号撤销后，其所在的69师转隶第16集团军（现第78集团军）。
description.en: After the 23rd Group Army was disbanded in 2003, the 69th Division he was in was transferred to the 16th Group Army (now the 78th Group Army).

侯继振

description.zh-cn: 盛斌接替到龄退役的侯继振中将出任沈阳军区副司令员。
description.en: Sheng Bin succeeded Lieutenant General Hou Jizhen, who retired due to age, as the Deputy Commander of the Shenyang Military Region.

relationships.target: 盛斌

description.zh-cn: 刘发庆接替盛斌出任中央军委国防动员部部长。
description.en: Liu Faqing succeeded Sheng Bin as the Minister of the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.target: 高潮 (少将)

description.zh-cn: 盛斌接替高潮出任黑龙江省军区司令员。
description.en: Sheng Bin succeeded Gao Chao as the Commander of the Heilongjiang Military District.

relationships.target: 盛斌

description.zh-cn: 李雷接替盛斌出任黑龙江省军区司令员。
description.en: Li Lei succeeded Sheng Bin as the Commander of the Heilongjiang Military District.

relationships.target: 王冠中

description.zh-cn: 盛斌接替王冠中出任国家国防动员委员会秘书长。
description.en: Sheng Bin succeeded Wang Guanzhong as the Secretary-General of the National Defense Mobilization Committee.
